episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of intriguing topics, including specialized planes designed to transport aircraft wings, Japan's peak number of traffic lights due to demographic changes, bacteria that consume clouds, and the surprising family connection between pop star Sabrina Carpenter and "The Simpsons" character Bart Simpson's voice actor, Nancy Cartwright.

facts.fact: Some planes are specifically built to carry other planes' wings.
Japan has just experienced its maximum ever number of traffic lights.
Number one selling singer, Sabrina Carpenter, is the niece of another number one selling singer, Bart Simpson.
